channel.title: First Time Login Help(will rep++)
channel.description:
Hey, so basically I'm doing a tutorial island type thing on a 317 PI. (2006remake)
What I need to know is how to make it when someone logs in for the first time they get the character creaton interface, but only for the first time. So like where would I add that and what would I type in for code?
Also, I when they log in for the first time (only) I want to be able to do sendStatement("Welcome to 2006Scape", "Speak to the Guide to begin.")
Thanks in advance.
EDIT: This is another thing. When the player is talking to the survival guide and talking about woodcutting, I have a part that says sendStatement("The Survival Guide gives you an axe!") How do I make it where they actually get the axe?

item.title: First Time Login Help(will rep++)
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“RS2006Phat, post:3, topic:430761”][quote author=pkufast link=topic=533437.msg3899537#msg3899537 date=1327630473]
lol… this is easy stuff dude. Also no one is going to give you the code, thats spoonfeeding.
[/quote]
I hate it when people say this. If it’s so fucking easy take two seconds of your time out to help me out. Also I don’t know what the code would be, so i’m asking for a “spoonfeed”. What else am I uspposed to do? guess?[/quote]

Find it. You have the source, not us. Usually, the command is similar to addItem(id, number). Key words: add, item.

pkufast:

Like i said in your other post, i wont help anyone anymore, until someone helps me on my post, which dont even try to help on mine, because if you cant figure out simple shit like this, you wont figure out the problem im having. So i’ll be glad to help you, when my topic gets a reply with an answer.

Selfish and shut up.

Read full topic

Hey, so basically I’m doing a tutorial island type thing on a 317 PI. (2006remake)

What I need to know is how to make it when someone logs in for the first time they get the character creaton interface, but only for the first time. So like where would I add that and what would I type in for code?
